author: Anonymous Scale
title: triangle-solitaire
question:
Could sb explain the idea for rendering the board function in triangle solitaire? I don't understand the main concept they wanted to do here
(define (render-board bd)
  (foldr above
         empty-image
         (map (lambda (row)
                (foldr (lambda (p img)
                         (beside (if (get-cell bd p) PEG HOLE)
                                 img))
                       empty-image
                       row))
              RENDER-MAP)))
student_answer: It renders each row either filled in or blank, then it combines all rows with above.
